abstract.t: This document describes a proposed extension to SIP.This document proposes a mechansim to encrypt/hide Record-Route andRoute entries in or to support confidentiality of SIP proxyrouting information. The functionality of the Record-Route andRoute headers are preserved.The introduction of this extension allows a set oftrusted SIP proxies to cooperatively hide the route thatSIP PDUs transit from untrusted proxies and user agents.
